span.p: The elementary and high school offices are open during the following times.
Do you have a child who will be 4 years old on, or before, September 1st, 2020? Are they excited to learn new things? Well then we have just the program for you!
Are you looking for additional seating? The Loyal FFA Alumni is offering table/chair rental.
You can do your Loyal apparel shopping online! #loyalproud
